message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a very reasonable price of $13,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet halfway at $11,000? This would be a fair compromise.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we meet halfway from my original offer at $9,500? I think that's a more reasonable compromise.
